_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Qualifications for being called a 'mendi: If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding form
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with feeling
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with perception
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with choices
If a mendicant teaches Dhamma for disillusionment with consciousness
If they practice for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding form
If they practice for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding consciousness
If they're freed by not grasping by disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding form
If they're freed by not grasping by disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding consciousness
